news.title: Beta v0.2.0
news.body:
An updated beta, v0.2.0, is now available. New features:
* 'Launch via Steam' option (enabled by default), which should allow use of the Steam Overlay when T:A is launched via the launcher
* Auto-inject option to automatically inject TAMods on a timer after the game is launched
* Community Reddit integration

news.title: TribesLauncher Beta
news.body: The TribesLauncher client is ready for beta. There's still some functionality to add, and many bugs to iron out. If you find a bug, let me know on Discord. Also hit me up if something doesn't work like you expect, or there's a feature you think is missing.
